title: ScanSoft PDF Converter Professional 5.0 (The Joker)
description:
Nuance ScanSoft PDF Converter Professional 5.0 
PDF Converter Professional 5, the only complete PDF solution designed specifically for business users, delivers everything you need to create, convert, and edit PDF files. 

- create PDF files from any PC application 
- combine multiple files into a single PDF document 
- combine multiple documents within a single PDF file 

- one-click conversion of PDF files into fully-formatted documents 
- convert to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and XPS or WordPerfect 
- convert \&#039;static\&#039; or scanned PDF files into searchable, editable PDF files 

- touch up text and images directly within PDF files 
- add notes, annotations, stamps, and watermarks 
- secure your PDF files by applying digital signatures and security settings 

Additionally, you can fill and save online PDF forms with one click, or secure your PDF files by applying digital signatures or using drag and drop security settings.
